# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width=10)
    lines = collect(eachline(str)) # 将字符串按行分割
    for i in 1:length(lines)-1
        if length(lines[i]) + length(lines[i+1]) > text_width
            # 找到最后一个空格字符的位置，并插入换行符
            insert!(lines, i + 1, "\n")
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "") # 将分割的行重新连接起来
end

str = "Hello this is a very long sentence that will test our wrapping function. It has several long words to make it more interesting."
println(wrap_string(str))
```

